title: EP 150: Predictive Coding: Is The Internet Driving People Insane?
itunes:title: EP 150: Predictive Coding: Is The Internet Driving People Insane?
description:
In this episode, We have a conversation with Da Hood Professor Melle Mel about everything from the recent mass shooting to the idiots presently disguising themselves as content creators and the possibility that it all may be attributed to "Predictive Coding"

Tap in with Melle Mel @dahoodpostman

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
